channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped sandbags on pavement, 22nd November
item.description:
Christ Church Road - adjacent to traffic light junction with A40 Lansdown Road. 2 sandbags dumped on pavement a few metres along Christ Church Road (close to traffic lights). 1 bag is split open. Need removing, and sand clearing up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ablington Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lampost rusting, 22nd November
item.description:
Paint has peeled away on the lampost and it has started to rust
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Super large &deep potholes along length of road, 22nd November
item.description:
This section of road is ignored when potholes are done. This road is used by a constant stream of vehicles and drivers. This road has been in this state for over a year and getting worse with the constant rain.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Coberley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers for cable works!!!!, 21st November
item.description:
Thr green barrier supposedly being used for "safety" are over all along Oldbury Road and Oldbury Close and also near Falkland Place. These barriers are not fit for purpose and in some instances create more of a hazzard than if they weren't there. I've reported this issue previously and Highways need to police these works, the safety measures put in place (or not) and the way traffic is managed as the works cause grid locks again and again.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 110 Hester's Way Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 21st November
item.description:
Street light out front of number 17 is not working first started to go on and off now not working at all
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Linden Close, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping by public waste bin, 21st November
item.description:
A black sack of general waste has been dumped beside the public bin on Robert Burns Ave. It is not fully sealed and waste has spilled on the verge and carriageway. Thanks for attending to this. Please convey my appreciation to your operatives as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass, 20th November
item.description:
Large amount of broken glass on path to the play area by Old Pates

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Everest Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes and uneven road surface, 19th November
item.description:
These potholes have been here for months. Some of the larger potholes have been filled, but the work completed was to such a poor standard that the potholes have returned after a spell of bad weather. The whole section of road needs resurfacing as many drivers are constantly swerving to dodge potholes.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 171 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large, deep dangerous pothole in Main Carriageway, 19th November
item.description:
Eastbound A40, dangerous and deep pothole Suspension damaging our cars serve which is also dangerous. Needs urgent attention before a serious accident occurs
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 406 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Driving over green, 18th November
item.description:
Tyre tracks left all over green
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Lynworth Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Carriageway potholes, 16th November
item.description:
There are a number of potholes on the Bath Road near the junction with Montpellier Drive. The carriageway seems to be deteriorating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 118 Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Telephone cable - rubbish, 16th November
item.description:
Rubbish entangled in overhead cables.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 New Barn Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on exit to roundabout, 16th November
item.description:
Small deep pothole on what looks like an access cover. I am concerned that it might cause a cyclist or motorcyclist to swerve suddenly at the roundabout exit to avoid it. It has been there for many months but I have only just remembered to report it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 44 Sandford Mill Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights not working Voxwell Lane, 15th November
item.description:
Voxwell Lane Street lights 12, 13 and 14 (between Furlong Lane and Snowshill Drive) have not been working for several days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Charlecote Corner, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brooklyn Road at the junction of Tennyson surface has gone big pothole opened up in the last day or so, 15th November
item.description:
Brooklyn Road at the junction of Tennyson surface has gone big pothole opened up in the last day or so. Estimate 6 to 7 cm deep deeper by tomorrow because it is in the run of the traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Brooklyn Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud on Road, 15th November
item.description:
Due to the ongoing building work on a near by building site, the road is covered in mud either side of the site access. I have reported this as a planning breach to the planning authority but is there anything that the highways team can do Road has been increasing slippy recently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Haydon Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement unsafe, 15th November
item.description:
Section of footpath outside 26 Cheltenham Road in need of reinstating, vehicles partially parked on footpath necessitate having to walk on the uneven surface, which is a trip hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Greystones Cottages Gloucester Street, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Island post, 14th November
item.description:
6539 island lighting post flashing and not permanently on. Has been like this for weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
